title: Magic Spells Sound Effects
description: The Magic Spells Sound Effects library is the perfect way to add high quality magic and fantasy spells to your video games and movies.
longDescription:
Any audio professional or enthusiast wishing to include a bit of magic and fantasy into their projects will find the Magic Spells Sound Effects Library to be an excellent resource. This collection offers a variety of possibilities to make your fantasy and magic-themed projects come to life with 150 top-notch sound effects. This library offers all the spells you could possibly need, from mild healing spells to delicate fireball spells to take down dragons and all in between.


Yet, this library's sound effects can be artistically applied to other genres as well, giving your work a distinctive touch. It is not just for projects with a fantasy or magic theme.


Aerial spells, Appearance and disappearance spells, Cauldron, Enchanted Arrows, Fireballs, Freezing Spells, Healing Spells, Incantation Spells, Lightning Spells, Metamorphosis, Potion, Protection Spells, Scrolls, Telekinesis, and Water Spells are among the many categories of spells included in this extensive collection. You can choose the ideal sound for your particular project by browsing the variety of sound effects available in each category.


Take your sound effects to the next level by adding the Magic Spells Sound Effects Collection to your library right away! You'll be able to produce genuinely fascinating and immersive audio experiences with the help of this collection.


DEMO SOUNDS
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Aerial Spells
  • Appearance & Disappearance Spells
  • Cauldron
  • Enchanted Arrows
  • Fireballs
  • Freezing Spells
  • Healing Spells
  • Incanation Spells
  • Lightning Spells
  • Metamorphosis
  • Potion
  • Protection Spells
  • Scrolls
  • Telekinesis
  • Water Spells


Number of Audio Waves: 150

Number of Audio Cues: 150

Sample rate / bit rate: WAV 96K 24bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 7 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: Single user license, royalty-free
